sections.summary: reliable and punctual sales associate who possesses an excellent work ethic and more than fifteen years in retail. areas of expertise include inventory, cash management, and exceptional customer service. personable customer service associate dedicated to providing the highest level of customer service. outgoing, and efficient with the capacity to multi-task. high-achieving sales associate offering an extensive background in customer service, sales, client relations and merchandising. self-directed and self-motivated team player who also works well independently. accomplishments consistently exceeded daily sales targets with an average of $1200 in sales each day. routinely helped as many as 200 customers each day in a high-volume retail outlet. received 5 "exceeds expectations" ratings on performance reviews.
